channel.title: Giant Bomb Presents: Film & 40s (Archive)
channel.description: The Film & 40s episodes of the Giant Bomb Presents show, courtesy of the Internet Archive.
channel.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
channel.itunes:summary: The Film & 40s episodes of the Giant Bomb Presents show, courtesy of the Internet Archive.
channel.generator: BlackDeath3's custom Giant Bomb RSS feed generator

item.title: Rocky IV
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Dan and Drew provide a beer-fueled commentary track for a movie that not only single-handedly ended the Cold War, but also features cake-serving robots, giant golden bull heads, and some of the greatest montages ever committed to celluloid. Ding, ding!
item.itunes:subtitle: Dan and Drew provide a beer-fueled commentary track for a movie that not only single-handedly ended the Cold War, but also features cake-serving robots, giant golden bull heads, and some of the greatest montages ever committed to celluloid. Ding, ding!
item.itunes:summary: Dan and Drew provide a beer-fueled commentary track for a movie that not only single-handedly ended the Cold War, but also features cake-serving robots, giant golden bull heads, and some of the greatest montages ever committed to celluloid. Ding, ding!

item.title: The Hunt for Red October
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Two buckaroos use their political intrigue and expert knowledge of underwater acoustics to finally locate some 40s for this deep dive into vintage Clance.
item.itunes:subtitle: Two buckaroos use their political intrigue and expert knowledge of underwater acoustics to finally locate some 40s for this deep dive into vintage Clance.
item.itunes:summary: Two buckaroos use their political intrigue and expert knowledge of underwater acoustics to finally locate some 40s for this deep dive into vintage Clance.

item.title: Commando
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Feeling stressed? Why not let off some steam by watching Arnold and his rippling, camouflaged muscles completely wreck an entire island full of dudes?
item.itunes:subtitle: Feeling stressed? Why not let off some steam by watching Arnold and his rippling, camouflaged muscles completely wreck an entire island full of dudes?
item.itunes:summary: Feeling stressed? Why not let off some steam by watching Arnold and his rippling, camouflaged muscles completely wreck an entire island full of dudes?

item.title: The Fast and the Furious (2001)
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: If we're gonna get through the entire Fast & Furious franchise, we're gonna need a stack of Blu-rays, a bagful of 40s, and NOS. Definitely gonna need NOS.
item.itunes:subtitle: If we're gonna get through the entire Fast & Furious franchise, we're gonna need a stack of Blu-rays, a bagful of 40s, and NOS. Definitely gonna need NOS.
item.itunes:summary: If we're gonna get through the entire Fast & Furious franchise, we're gonna need a stack of Blu-rays, a bagful of 40s, and NOS. Definitely gonna need NOS.

item.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: We hungry for more Fast and Furious, bro. Unfortunately bro, this week we're forced to feast on the least of all F&F movies, 2 Fast 2 Furious. Thank god for these 40s, right bro?
item.itunes:subtitle: We hungry for more Fast and Furious, bro. Unfortunately bro, this week we're forced to feast on the least of all F&F movies, 2 Fast 2 Furious. Thank god for these 40s, right bro?
item.itunes:summary: We hungry for more Fast and Furious, bro. Unfortunately bro, this week we're forced to feast on the least of all F&F movies, 2 Fast 2 Furious. Thank god for these 40s, right bro?

item.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Giant Bomb's resident Drift King Jeff Gerstmann joins the Beast crew as we screech our way through the greatest of all the drifting-focused Fast and the Furious movies.
item.itunes:subtitle: Giant Bomb's resident Drift King Jeff Gerstmann joins the Beast crew as we screech our way through the greatest of all the drifting-focused Fast and the Furious movies.
item.itunes:summary: Giant Bomb's resident Drift King Jeff Gerstmann joins the Beast crew as we screech our way through the greatest of all the drifting-focused Fast and the Furious movies.

item.title: Fast & Furious
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: We've got tankers full of malt liquor and we're ready to ride once more with Dom and Brian as we clear the last hurdle before the Fast & Furious franchise shifts into top gear.
item.itunes:subtitle: We've got tankers full of malt liquor and we're ready to ride once more with Dom and Brian as we clear the last hurdle before the Fast & Furious franchise shifts into top gear.
item.itunes:summary: We've got tankers full of malt liquor and we're ready to ride once more with Dom and Brian as we clear the last hurdle before the Fast & Furious franchise shifts into top gear.

item.title: Fast Five
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: We reunite the entire Beast family for a long car trip down to Rio de Janeiro to steal a safe full of malt liquor.
item.itunes:subtitle: We reunite the entire Beast family for a long car trip down to Rio de Janeiro to steal a safe full of malt liquor.
item.itunes:summary: We reunite the entire Beast family for a long car trip down to Rio de Janeiro to steal a safe full of malt liquor.

item.title: Fast & Furious 6
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: We're six movies and damn near a thousand ounces deep into our Fast & Furious journey, and things just keep getting stupider. Amnesia! Tanks! Impossible runways! THIS. IS. FILM. AND. 40S.
item.itunes:subtitle: We're six movies and damn near a thousand ounces deep into our Fast & Furious journey, and things just keep getting stupider. Amnesia! Tanks! Impossible runways! THIS. IS. FILM. AND. 40S.
item.itunes:summary: We're six movies and damn near a thousand ounces deep into our Fast & Furious journey, and things just keep getting stupider. Amnesia! Tanks! Impossible runways! THIS. IS. FILM. AND. 40S.

item.title: Furious 7
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Vinny, Dan, and Alex get together for one last ridiculous ride. Salute, mi familia.
item.itunes:subtitle: Vinny, Dan, and Alex get together for one last ridiculous ride. Salute, mi familia.
item.itunes:summary: Vinny, Dan, and Alex get together for one last ridiculous ride. Salute, mi familia.

item.title: Battle Royale
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Abby, Alex, Dan, and Vinny return to the source of the Battle Royale craze to see if these high school students have any useful strategies for future Battlegrounds matches.
item.itunes:subtitle: Abby, Alex, Dan, and Vinny return to the source of the Battle Royale craze to see if these high school students have any useful strategies for future Battlegrounds matches.
item.itunes:summary: Abby, Alex, Dan, and Vinny return to the source of the Battle Royale craze to see if these high school students have any useful strategies for future Battlegrounds matches.

item.title: They Live
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Abby and Jeff Bakalar put on the glasses for the first time as the Beast crew CONSUMES one of John Carpenter's greatest masterpieces.
item.itunes:subtitle: Abby and Jeff Bakalar put on the glasses for the first time as the Beast crew CONSUMES one of John Carpenter's greatest masterpieces.
item.itunes:summary: Abby and Jeff Bakalar put on the glasses for the first time as the Beast crew CONSUMES one of John Carpenter's greatest masterpieces.

item.title: Face/Off
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: A very special guest joins us as we kick off our Nicolas Cage retrospective with a movie so good, Dan played it at his wedding.
item.itunes:subtitle: A very special guest joins us as we kick off our Nicolas Cage retrospective with a movie so good, Dan played it at his wedding.
item.itunes:summary: A very special guest joins us as we kick off our Nicolas Cage retrospective with a movie so good, Dan played it at his wedding.

item.title: National Treasure
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: We love American history here at Giant Bomb, so what better way to show that love than to get wasted and watch the critically acclaimed documentary National Treasure?
item.itunes:subtitle: We love American history here at Giant Bomb, so what better way to show that love than to get wasted and watch the critically acclaimed documentary National Treasure?
item.itunes:summary: We love American history here at Giant Bomb, so what better way to show that love than to get wasted and watch the critically acclaimed documentary National Treasure?

item.title: Con Air
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Of the films in the Nicolas Cage action movie holy trinity, we can safely say that Con Air is the one that most deserves to be excommunicated. But we still got hammered and watched it anyway.
item.itunes:subtitle: Of the films in the Nicolas Cage action movie holy trinity, we can safely say that Con Air is the one that most deserves to be excommunicated. But we still got hammered and watched it anyway.
item.itunes:summary: Of the films in the Nicolas Cage action movie holy trinity, we can safely say that Con Air is the one that most deserves to be excommunicated. But we still got hammered and watched it anyway.

item.title: The Rock
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Jeff Gerstmann joins the east coast crew as we attempt to answer the most pressing questions of our time: Who is Womack, and is he, in fact, a piece of shit?
item.itunes:subtitle: Jeff Gerstmann joins the east coast crew as we attempt to answer the most pressing questions of our time: Who is Womack, and is he, in fact, a piece of shit?
item.itunes:summary: Jeff Gerstmann joins the east coast crew as we attempt to answer the most pressing questions of our time: Who is Womack, and is he, in fact, a piece of shit?

item.title: Vampire's Kiss
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Trying to explain what the hell Nicolas Cage is doing in Vampire's Kiss is a fool's errand, so instead, let's just get hammered and let the insanity wash over us.
item.itunes:subtitle: Trying to explain what the hell Nicolas Cage is doing in Vampire's Kiss is a fool's errand, so instead, let's just get hammered and let the insanity wash over us.
item.itunes:summary: Trying to explain what the hell Nicolas Cage is doing in Vampire's Kiss is a fool's errand, so instead, let's just get hammered and let the insanity wash over us.

item.title: Bad Lieutenant: Port of Call New Orleans
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: While most would consider Harvey Keitel the baddest of all lieutenants, Nicolas Cage gives him a run for his money in this off-kilter Herzog joint.
item.itunes:subtitle: While most would consider Harvey Keitel the baddest of all lieutenants, Nicolas Cage gives him a run for his money in this off-kilter Herzog joint.
item.itunes:summary: While most would consider Harvey Keitel the baddest of all lieutenants, Nicolas Cage gives him a run for his money in this off-kilter Herzog joint.

item.title: The Wicker Man (2006)
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Waypoint's Austin Walker joins the Bee-st crew to pick apart this absurd, terrible, absurdly terrible remake.
item.itunes:subtitle: Waypoint's Austin Walker joins the Bee-st crew to pick apart this absurd, terrible, absurdly terrible remake.
item.itunes:summary: Waypoint's Austin Walker joins the Bee-st crew to pick apart this absurd, terrible, absurdly terrible remake.

item.title: Drive Angry
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: To close out our Nicolas Cage retrospective, we watch the film that you--yes, YOU--chose for us to watch. So buckle up, crack open a drink, and always remember: don't drive angry. DON'T DRIVE ANGRY.
item.itunes:subtitle: To close out our Nicolas Cage retrospective, we watch the film that you--yes, YOU--chose for us to watch. So buckle up, crack open a drink, and always remember: don't drive angry. DON'T DRIVE ANGRY.
item.itunes:summary: To close out our Nicolas Cage retrospective, we watch the film that you--yes, YOU--chose for us to watch. So buckle up, crack open a drink, and always remember: don't drive angry. DON'T DRIVE ANGRY.

item.title: The Return of the Living Dead
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: The Beast crew kicks off an October of delightful horror cinema with a zombie classic best known for both its extremely cool teens, and extremely gross practical effects.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Beast crew kicks off an October of delightful horror cinema with a zombie classic best known for both its extremely cool teens, and extremely gross practical effects.
item.itunes:summary: The Beast crew kicks off an October of delightful horror cinema with a zombie classic best known for both its extremely cool teens, and extremely gross practical effects.

item.title: Premonition
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Sandra Bullock may be America's sweetheart, but is her charm enough to carry this goofy-ass supernatural thriller? Join the Beast crew as we have a few drinks and find out for ourselves.
item.itunes:subtitle: Sandra Bullock may be America's sweetheart, but is her charm enough to carry this goofy-ass supernatural thriller? Join the Beast crew as we have a few drinks and find out for ourselves.
item.itunes:summary: Sandra Bullock may be America's sweetheart, but is her charm enough to carry this goofy-ass supernatural thriller? Join the Beast crew as we have a few drinks and find out for ourselves.

item.title: Killer Klowns from Outer Space
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: What kind of clowns would record themselves getting drunk and watching weird horror movies? The Giant Beast clowns, of course! Join these clowns as they clown around on this 1980s clown horror classic! CLOWNS!
item.itunes:subtitle: What kind of clowns would record themselves getting drunk and watching weird horror movies? The Giant Beast clowns, of course! Join these clowns as they clown around on this 1980s clown horror classic! CLOWNS!
item.itunes:summary: What kind of clowns would record themselves getting drunk and watching weird horror movies? The Giant Beast clowns, of course! Join these clowns as they clown around on this 1980s clown horror classic! CLOWNS!

item.title: Jason X
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: In the first installment of our Vinny Caravella double feature, we take to the stars and watch a bunch of space-faring future teens run smack-dab into an ancient, technologically enhanced murder man.
item.itunes:subtitle: In the first installment of our Vinny Caravella double feature, we take to the stars and watch a bunch of space-faring future teens run smack-dab into an ancient, technologically enhanced murder man.
item.itunes:summary: In the first installment of our Vinny Caravella double feature, we take to the stars and watch a bunch of space-faring future teens run smack-dab into an ancient, technologically enhanced murder man.

item.title: The Thing (1982)
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: We've done a bunch of very silly movies over the course of this October, so we close out our series of horror films with a genuine classic in John Carpenter's paranoia-fueled monster masterpiece, The Thing!
item.itunes:subtitle: We've done a bunch of very silly movies over the course of this October, so we close out our series of horror films with a genuine classic in John Carpenter's paranoia-fueled monster masterpiece, The Thing!
item.itunes:summary: We've done a bunch of very silly movies over the course of this October, so we close out our series of horror films with a genuine classic in John Carpenter's paranoia-fueled monster masterpiece, The Thing!

item.title: The Gate
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: The gates of hell have opened, and the foul stench of malt liquor is flowing across the land! Only Giant Bomb's plucky heroes can seal away the doom forever by watching this campy 1987 horror classic.
item.itunes:subtitle: The gates of hell have opened, and the foul stench of malt liquor is flowing across the land! Only Giant Bomb's plucky heroes can seal away the doom forever by watching this campy 1987 horror classic.
item.itunes:summary: The gates of hell have opened, and the foul stench of malt liquor is flowing across the land! Only Giant Bomb's plucky heroes can seal away the doom forever by watching this campy 1987 horror classic.

item.title: Event Horizon
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Mike Mahardy fills in for Abby this week as we take a leisurely jaunt out to Neptune to see what all the fussin' and the screamin' and the eye-clawin' is about over on the old Event Horizon.
item.itunes:subtitle: Mike Mahardy fills in for Abby this week as we take a leisurely jaunt out to Neptune to see what all the fussin' and the screamin' and the eye-clawin' is about over on the old Event Horizon.
item.itunes:summary: Mike Mahardy fills in for Abby this week as we take a leisurely jaunt out to Neptune to see what all the fussin' and the screamin' and the eye-clawin' is about over on the old Event Horizon.

item.title: The Exorcist
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: The power of Christ compels us to watch William Friedkin's 1973 horror classic! Presumably the power of Satan compelled us to do it while drinking.
item.itunes:subtitle: The power of Christ compels us to watch William Friedkin's 1973 horror classic! Presumably the power of Satan compelled us to do it while drinking.
item.itunes:summary: The power of Christ compels us to watch William Friedkin's 1973 horror classic! Presumably the power of Satan compelled us to do it while drinking.

item.title: Gremlins 2: The New Batch
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Happy Halloween, everyone! To celebrate this scariest of holidays, we're watching the consensus scariest movie of all time, Gremlins 2: The New Batch! No movie has ever been scarier! Quote us on that!
item.itunes:subtitle: Happy Halloween, everyone! To celebrate this scariest of holidays, we're watching the consensus scariest movie of all time, Gremlins 2: The New Batch! No movie has ever been scarier! Quote us on that!
item.itunes:summary: Happy Halloween, everyone! To celebrate this scariest of holidays, we're watching the consensus scariest movie of all time, Gremlins 2: The New Batch! No movie has ever been scarier! Quote us on that!

item.title: Pokemon: The First Movie
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: To celebrate the 20th Anniversary of the US release of the Pokemon movie and the release of Sword and Shield we decided to watch the first Pokemon movie!
item.itunes:subtitle: To celebrate the 20th Anniversary of the US release of the Pokemon movie and the release of Sword and Shield we decided to watch the first Pokemon movie!
item.itunes:summary: To celebrate the 20th Anniversary of the US release of the Pokemon movie and the release of Sword and Shield we decided to watch the first Pokemon movie!

item.title: Mickeys and Whiskies: Brink!
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Ben, Abby, and Jan are back to have a quick skate session in another Disney Channel Original movie. On their journey they learn about supporting a family, breaking your back, and skating with SOUL!
item.itunes:subtitle: Ben, Abby, and Jan are back to have a quick skate session in another Disney Channel Original movie. On their journey they learn about supporting a family, breaking your back, and skating with SOUL!
item.itunes:summary: Ben, Abby, and Jan are back to have a quick skate session in another Disney Channel Original movie. On their journey they learn about supporting a family, breaking your back, and skating with SOUL!

item.title: Mickeys and Whiskies: The Other Me
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Jan, Abby, and Ben are back for another round of nostalgia. This time we get down into the science and morals of cloning, dancing in the cafeteria, and pizza!
item.itunes:subtitle: Jan, Abby, and Ben are back for another round of nostalgia. This time we get down into the science and morals of cloning, dancing in the cafeteria, and pizza!
item.itunes:summary: Jan, Abby, and Ben are back for another round of nostalgia. This time we get down into the science and morals of cloning, dancing in the cafeteria, and pizza!

item.title: BOO(ze)!: Hausu
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: We're back with more booze and movies to kick off the spooky season with the absolute classic: Hausu/House!
item.itunes:subtitle: We're back with more booze and movies to kick off the spooky season with the absolute classic: Hausu/House!
item.itunes:summary: We're back with more booze and movies to kick off the spooky season with the absolute classic: Hausu/House!

item.title: BOO(ze)!: The Blob (1988)
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: We've assembled the grossest podcast crew to watch another spooky film! GET READY TO GET BLOBBED!
item.itunes:subtitle: We've assembled the grossest podcast crew to watch another spooky film! GET READY TO GET BLOBBED!
item.itunes:summary: We've assembled the grossest podcast crew to watch another spooky film! GET READY TO GET BLOBBED!

item.title: BOO(ze)!: Idle Hands
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Are my hands still idle if I'm holding a cold 40oz?
item.itunes:subtitle: Are my hands still idle if I'm holding a cold 40oz?
item.itunes:summary: Are my hands still idle if I'm holding a cold 40oz?

item.title: BOO(ze)!: Leprechaun
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: How lucky are we to get to hangout with y'all and watch SPOOKY movies? Enjoy the conclusion of BOOze!
item.itunes:subtitle: How lucky are we to get to hangout with y'all and watch SPOOKY movies? Enjoy the conclusion of BOOze!
item.itunes:summary: How lucky are we to get to hangout with y'all and watch SPOOKY movies? Enjoy the conclusion of BOOze!

item.title: Silent Hill (2006)
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Our daughter is sleepwalking and having visions! It's only right to drink a 40oz and watch a movie to help the problem!
item.itunes:subtitle: Our daughter is sleepwalking and having visions! It's only right to drink a 40oz and watch a movie to help the problem!
item.itunes:summary: Our daughter is sleepwalking and having visions! It's only right to drink a 40oz and watch a movie to help the problem!

item.title: The Terminator (1984)
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description:
What better way to finally watch a piece of cinematic history than with 4 other belligerent people screaming about the movie the whole time? Join us as Jeff Bakalar watches The Terminator for the first time!
We watched this on Amazon Prime Video, but it

item.title: Road House (1989)
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: PAIN DON'T HURT. We promised we'd do it and here it is! A big thank you to everyone that hung out and got us to the goal of talking over Roadhouse after the Giant Bombathon.
item.itunes:subtitle: PAIN DON'T HURT. We promised we'd do it and here it is! A big thank you to everyone that hung out and got us to the goal of talking over Roadhouse after the Giant Bombathon.
item.itunes:summary: PAIN DON'T HURT. We promised we'd do it and here it is! A big thank you to everyone that hung out and got us to the goal of talking over Roadhouse after the Giant Bombathon.

item.title: Hellraiser (1987)
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Hello sweet cenobites and cinnamon rolls! The crew has gotten together to watch the original Hellraiser (1987)!
item.itunes:subtitle: Hello sweet cenobites and cinnamon rolls! The crew has gotten together to watch the original Hellraiser (1987)!
item.itunes:summary: Hello sweet cenobites and cinnamon rolls! The crew has gotten together to watch the original Hellraiser (1987)!

item.title: RoboCop (1987)
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description:
Dan and Grubb pour 40s directly into RoboMitch as they all watch the masterpiece that is RoboCop.
(Movie starts at ~5:00ish)
item.itunes:subtitle:
Dan and Grubb pour 40s directly into RoboMitch as they all watch the masterpiece that is RoboCop.

item.title: Annette
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: EVERYONE'S BEEN ASKING AND HERE IT IS: ANNETTE!
